title: Doctor Serajul Islam dies
body: Renowned physician and public health expert Mohd Serajul Islam passed away at a hospital in the capital on Sunday. He was laid to rest at Uttara Sector 4 graveyard, said a press release. The former director at the National Tuberculosis and Leprosy Program and former Vice-president at the National Heart Foundation, he was undergoing treatment at the hospital for his old age complications. He is survived by his children, Dr. Rezwan Islam, Tanvir Islam, and Nabila Islam, their spouses and six grandchildren, and many family members and well-wishers. Serajul Islam is remembered for his integrity, leadership, humility, and lifelong dedication to medicine and public health. He was born in Jhenidah to the late Kismat Ali, a prominent attorney, his brothers Amirul Islam and Nazrul Islam were founding members of ABC Ltd.
